title: Can we please just remove kai sa and nerf vayne already?
body:
You've sold your weeb skins.  There is nothing interesting about her or her kit.  She's just a generic adc with overtuned numbers and 5 million passives.  Riot hasn't released a champ/rework in the past 2 years that doesn't just piss me off.

Vayne was overpowered when she had 8% damage on W in season 3.  Now riot fucked the game so much they didn't wanna leave vayne behind so they gave her 14% and double stealth.  JUST DONT GET AUTOD 3 TIMES DURRRR.

Every single game if I ban Kai sa they pick Vayne.  If I ban Vayne they pick Kai Sa.  If both are banned they play Xayah

replies.body: kaisa and vayne dont have weeb skins
kda is the most weeb shit ive ever seen
Sure. As soon as we remove every juggernaut ever, and every diver ever.
Silver Bolts used to have a flat damage component. It was removed and replaced with additional percentage damage.
there should be a rule that says if you want any champion removed from the game that you get instantly removed from the boards... permanently
